content: आयुष्य {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [आयुः प्रयोजनमस्य, यत्] Promoting long life, vital, preservative of life; इदं यशस्यमायुष्यमिदं निःश्रेयसं परं <ls>Ms. 1. 106</ls>, <ls n="Ms.">3. 106</ls>, <ls n="Ms.">4. 13</ls>; <ls>M. 4. 4</ls> <ab>v. l.</ab>; <ls>Dk. 158.</ls> --ष्यं {@--1@} Vital power, abundance of life or vigour. {@--2@} <ab>N.</ab> of a ceremony performed after the birth of a child.
